name: Post-apocalyptic "La Dance"
description:
Nations compete for greatness. As a result, we have a shattered planet made out of dust from the past.
Civilization and the most of its wealth have been annihilated. Look for life in the last of the simple things. Matisse's composition, superb in front of a little person, appears to offer power and inspiration to renew. The hero appears to discover a point of reference and delight for himself, and everyone within is chanting an ode to life.

A dance makes it simpler to live. Even though this dance is a relic of a long-gone culture.
